price: Onlar Yusifin hüzuruna daxil olduqda, o, ata-anasını bağrına basıb dedi: “Allahın istəyi ilə, əmin-amanlıq içində Misirə daxil olun!”
arabic: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَبَوَيۡهِ وَقَالَ ٱدۡخُلُواْ مِصۡرَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā dakhalū ʿalā yūsufa āwā ilayhi abawayhi waqāla ud'khulū miṣ'ra in shāa al-lahu āminīna
